description: This file defines a JiraApiService class that provides methods to interact with Jira's REST API, including verifying credentials, fetching projects, project details, and issues by type. It encapsulates API calls and handles authentication headers and URL construction.

classes.name: JiraApiService
classes.description: A service class providing methods to interact with Jira's REST API, including credential verification, project retrieval, and issue fetching.

methods.name: createAuthHeader
methods.description: Creates a Basic Authentication header using Jira credentials.

methods.name: getBaseUrl
methods.description: Constructs the base URL for Jira API calls, ensuring it starts with 'http' or 'https'.

methods.name: verifyCredentials
methods.description: Verifies Jira credentials by calling the 'myself' endpoint to check authentication validity.

methods.name: fetchProjects
methods.description: Fetches the list of Jira projects accessible with the provided credentials.

methods.name: fetchProjectDetails
methods.description: Retrieves detailed information about a specific Jira project identified by its key.

methods.name: fetchIssuesByType
methods.description: Fetches issues from a Jira project filtered by issue type ID.
